title: Soon, Jaywalking Will No Longer Be a Crime in California
description: Supporters of decriminalization, which takes effect Jan. 1, say the laws have disproportionately targeted people based on race and economic status.
dc:creator: McKenna Oxenden
media:credit: Felix Uribe for The New York Times
media:description: When he was homeless for 12 years, Jason Sarris says the police targeted him with tickets for jaywalking and similar offenses that left him facing $5,000 in fines.
